mainEntity.name: How long does a bathroom remodel take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Bathroom remodel timelines vary depending on size and complexity, typically ranging from 2-6 weeks. We provide a detailed schedule during the planning stage.

mainEntity.name: Do you handle design and material selection?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we offer full design consultation, helping clients select tiles, fixtures, vanities, lighting, and flooring to achieve the desired aesthetic and functionality.

mainEntity.name: Are your remodels licensed and insured?

acceptedAnswer.text: All remodeling work is completed by fully licensed and insured professionals, ensuring quality, safety, and compliance with local building codes.
